net.tridentsdk.server.threads

Class ConcurrentTaskExecutor<Assignment>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.server.threads.ConcurrentTaskExecutor<Assignment>
  • Type Parameters:
    Assignment - the assignment type, if used

    public class ConcurrentTaskExecutor<Assignment>
extends java.lang.Object
    Thread list to allow task execution in a shared thread scaled with removal

    Allows assignment of a worker to the user

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConcurrentTaskExecutor(int scale)
      Create a new executor using the number of threads to scale

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TaskExecutor assign(TaskExecutor executor, Assignment assignment)
      Assigns the scaled thread to the assignment
      TaskExecutor getScaledThread()
      Gets a thread that has the least amount of assignment uses.
      void removeAssignment(Assignment assignment)
      Removes the assigned thread and reduces by one the scale factor for the thread
      void shutdown()
      Shuts down the thread processes
      java.util.Collection<TaskExecutor> threadList()
      Lists all available task executors from the threads
      java.util.Collection<Assignment> values()
      Returns the assigned objects

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConcurrentTaskExecutor

        public ConcurrentTaskExecutor(int scale)
        Create a new executor using the number of threads to scale
        Parameters:
        scale - the threads to use

    • Method Detail

      • getScaledThread

        public TaskExecutor getScaledThread()
        Gets a thread that has the least amount of assignment uses. You must assign the user before this can scale.
        Returns:
        the thread with the lowest assignments

      • assign

        public TaskExecutor assign(TaskExecutor executor,
                  Assignment assignment)
        Assigns the scaled thread to the assignment

        If already assigned, the executor is returned for the fast-path

        Parameters:
        executor - the executor associated with the assignment
        assignment - the assignment that uses the executor
        Returns:
        the executor assigned

      • removeAssignment

        public void removeAssignment(Assignment assignment)
        Removes the assigned thread and reduces by one the scale factor for the thread
        Parameters:
        assignment - the assignment that uses the executor to be removed

      • values

        public java.util.Collection<Assignment> values()
        Returns the assigned objects
        Returns:
        the assignments in the maps

      • threadList

        public java.util.Collection<TaskExecutor> threadList()
        Lists all available task executors from the threads
        Returns:
        the thread list

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts down the thread processes
